General.Name: Ningxia Xiaoming Agriculture & Animal Husbandry Co.Ltd
General.Description: Ningxia Xiaoming Agriculture & Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd engages in the layer breeding business in China. Its primary products are chicken and its by-products, such as eggs, chicks, etc. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Yinchuan, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jianfeng  Du
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors, Deputy GM & Director

7.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Sales Director
